thread.title: Pre-Market Technical Scan on Scientific & Technical Instruments Equities -- Fortive, Garmin, II-VI, and MKS Instruments

author: cnbc.com
title: Pre-Market Technical Scan on Scientific & Technical Instruments Equities -- Fortive, Garmin, II-VI, and MKS Instruments

organizations.name: pre-market technical scan on scientific & technical instruments equities

text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 9, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on FTV, GRMN, IIVI, and MKSI which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . For today, WallStEquities.com monitors the recent performance of Fortive Corp. (NYSE: FTV), Garmin Ltd (NASDAQ: GRMN), II-VI Inc. (NASDAQ: IIVI), and MKS Instruments Inc. (NASDAQ: MKSI). Scientific and Technical Instruments companies design, develop, manufacture, and market scientific and technical instruments ranging from GPS-enabled products to computerized machine tools, and to military range instrumentation systems. All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
Fortive
On Thursday, shares in Everett, Washington-based Fortive Corp. recorded a trading volume of 2.33 million shares, which was above their three months average volume of 1.31 million shares. The stock ended the session 3.56% lower at $69.14. The Company's shares have gained 23.07% over the past year. The stock is trading 1.04% above its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of Fortive, which owns and operates industrial units that manufacture testing and measurement equipment, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 27.63.
On January 23 rd , 2018, Fortive announced that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.07 per share, payable on March 29 th , 2018, to stockholders of record on February 23 rd , 2018. Get the full research report on FTV for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=FTV
Garmin
Schaffhausen, Switzerland-based Garmin Ltd's stock closed the day 3.09% lower at $61.13. A total volume of 1.29 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 1.15 million shares. The Company's shares have advanced 2.14% in the past month, 3.24% in the previous three months, and 25.14% over the past year. The stock is trading 10.57% above its 200-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Garmin have an RSI of 43.15.
On January 23 rd , 2018, Garmin announced the Approach X10, a comfortable golf band that comes preloaded with data for over 41,000 courses around the world. Golfers of all levels can easily see precise distances to the front, back, and middle of the green, as well as hazards on the touch-screen display. Free research on GRMN can be accessed at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=GRMN
II-VI
Shares in Saxonburg, Pennsylvania headquartered II-VI Inc. recorded a trading volume of 1.32 million shares, which was higher than their three months average volume of 894,010 shares. The stock ended yesterday's trading session 4.03% lower at $38.15. The Company's shares are trading below their 200-day moving average by 4.06%. Furthermore, shares of II-VI, which provides engineered materials and optoelectronic components worldwide, have an RSI of 32.22.
On January 22 nd , 2018, research firm Northland Capital downgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Outperform' to 'Market Perform'.
On January 24 th , 2018, II-VI announced the introduction of its freeform beam shaping laser optics for fiber and direct diode laser applications. This industry-leading freeform diamond turning capabilities deliver custom high-power laser optics with precise surface finish to enable the design of highly differentiated beam shaping optical systems used in advanced laser processing heads. Visit WallStEquities.com now and sign up for the free research on IIVI at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=IIVI
MKS Instruments
Andover, Massachusetts headquartered MKS Instruments Inc.'s stock finished Thursday's session 6.23% lower at $97.05. A total volume of 1.06 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 732,560 shares. The Company's shares have advanced 46.05% over the past year. The stock is trading above its 200-day moving average by 8.79%. Additionally, shares of MKS Instruments, which provides instruments, subsystems, and process control solutions that measure, control, power, deliver, monitor, and analyze critical parameters of manufacturing processes worldwide, have an RSI of 42.88.
On January 30 th , 2018, MKS Instruments announced the launch of a new lab program that helps researchers put together a complete laboratory solution. Members of the MKS New Lab program will receive product discounts and enhanced services from the MKS, Newport, Ophir, and Spectra-Physics brands. The program, which is free to join, also includes high-quality products and solutions across lasers, photonics, optics, opto-mechanics, motion, and vibration control. The free technical report on MKSI is available at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=MKSI
--
